name: hexurb
description:
hexurb is a calm, peaceful city builder where you can relax after a hard day and just have a good time!


You have to place blocks wisely on the playing field, complete tasks, expand the available territory and see how far you can go in your endeavors!


hexurb is ready to offer you:
  • calm gameplay
  • pleasant visual style
  • peaceful soundtrack
  • high replayability

Actually, there is no team. Just one simple person who loves games and wants to be part of the gaming community.
